thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 27 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Partners Group Says To Invest A$700 Million In Australian Renewable Energy Platform

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Partners Group Says To Invest A$700 Million In Australian Renewable Energy Platform
text:
May 27 (Reuters) - Partners Group Holding AG:
* CO TO INVEST A$700 MILLION IN AUSTRALIAN RENEWABLE ENERGY PLATFORM; SAYS IMMINENT CONSTRUCTION OF CRUDINE RIDGE WIND FARM
* INVESTMENT IN PLATFORM TO BE KNOWN LOCALLY AS GRASSROOTS RENEWABLE ENERGY PLATFORM
* PARTNERS GROUP HOLDING- GRASSROOTS TO BE SEEDED WITH 270MW SAPPHIRE WIND FARM PROJECT
* PARTNERS GROUP HOLDING- GRASSROOTS WILL IN ADDITION CONSTRUCT OVER 1.3GW OF NEW WIND POWER, SOLAR POWER, BATTERY STORAGE ASSETS WITHIN NEXT 4 YEARS
* TO REALIZE GRASSROOTS PLATFORM, PARTNERS GROUP HAS TEAMED WITH LOCAL DEVELOPER CWP RENEWABLES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
